options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

list.label: Metric
list.name: metric
list.query: MAE : mae, CRPS : crps, RMSE : rmse, ACC : acc, Bias : bias, SMAPE : smape, SEEPS : seeps, Heidke (1/5/10/20mm) : heidke-1-5-10-20, POD 1mm : pod-1, POD 5mm : pod-5, POD 10mm : pod-10, FAR 1mm : far-1, FAR 5mm : far-5, FAR 10mm : far-10, ETS 1mm : ets-1, ETS 5mm : ets-5, ETS 10mm : ets-10

list.definition:
select 
forecast as __value,
case
 when forecast = 'salient' then 'Salient' 
when forecast = 'climatology_2015' then 'Clim 1985-2014' 
when forecast = 'climatology_trend_2015' then 'Clim + Trend' 
when forecast = 'climatology_rolling' then 'Clim Rolling' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er' then 'ECMWF IFS ER' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased' then 'ECMWF IFS ER Debiased' 
when forecast = 'fuxi' then 'FuXi S2S' 
 else forecast
end as __text
from "${precip_tab_name_baseline}" where week1 is not null
list.label: Baseline
list.name: baseline
list.query:
select 
forecast as __value,
case
 when forecast = 'salient' then 'Salient' 
when forecast = 'climatology_2015' then 'Clim 1985-2014' 
when forecast = 'climatology_trend_2015' then 'Clim + Trend' 
when forecast = 'climatology_rolling' then 'Clim Rolling' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er' then 'ECMWF IFS ER' 
when forecast = 'ecmwf_ifs_er_debiased' then 'ECMWF IFS ER Debiased' 
when forecast = 'fuxi' then 'FuXi S2S' 
 else forecast
end as __text
from "${precip_tab_name_baseline}" where week1 is not null

list.label: Ground Truth
list.name: truth
list.query: ERA5 : era5, IMERG : imerg, GHCN : ghcn, CHIRPS : chirps, TAHMO : tahmo

list.label: Region
list.name: region
list.query: Africa : africa, East Africa : east_africa, Global : global, CONUS : conus

list.label: Time Grouping
list.name: time_grouping
list.query: None : None, Month of Year : month_of_year, Year : year

list.definition:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN 'select v.* from (values (''None'')) v(t)'
    ELSE 'select distinct time from "${precip_tab_name}"'
END
from (values ('$time_grouping')) v(g)
list.name: time_filter_filter_query
list.query:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN 'select v.* from (values (''None'')) v(t)'
    ELSE 'select distinct time from "${precip_tab_name}"'
END
from (values ('$time_grouping')) v(g)

list.definition:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN ''
    ELSE 'where time = ' || v.t
END
from (values ('$time_filter', '$time_grouping')) v(t, g)
list.name: time_filter_query
list.query:
select 
CASE
    WHEN v.g = 'None' THEN ''
    ELSE 'where time = ' || v.t
END
from (values ('$time_filter', '$time_grouping')) v(t, g)
